{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$643.2K in 2020-2021 on contracts with ETICO.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [ETICO INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22ETICO%20INC%22)
- [ETICO INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22ETICO%20INC.%22)
- [Etico Inc](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Etico%20Inc%22)
{{< /details >}}
